subject: RTSC Show Today at 5:30pm est.--11/15
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Please tune in on Sunday to RTSC Talk radio for what could be one of our
best shows to date.

Our guest this week is Rosemary Ellen Guiley.

She has written several books on demons, fairies and owns several frank's boxes.
This is a show not to miss.

We are starting at a special time of 5:30pm est. We will have all the chats
open and will be taking calls during the show.

The Chat:

http://www.keyportparanormal.com/chatroom.html

or

http://www.gameconradio.com/

The call in # is 732-587-7041


Thanx,
-Steve H.
